message: adobe photoshop mobile version it is also free i think too or at least when i got it was free
I'm looking for something that offers effects like Instagram but also allows you to edit, crop, etc. Sharing is NOT a must.
@felipecerda I dig Camera+ a whole lot. Shoots photos, edits with tons of effects, cropping, sharing. Appreciate the timer and stabilizer features too.
Camera+ is probably what you're looking for.
yep, camera+ and for HDR ProHDR works great. If Lisa included HDR in camera+ that would be all I needed for a camera app!
Thanks guys. What about Camera Plus Pro? It records video also. Looks very similar to Camera+. Have you tried it? I think I have to decide between those 2.
@felipecerda I shoot the video clips with the native app and then edit with ReelDirector
Photogene, Real Camera, Picture Show are all excellent, but I'd have to say my favorite is Swankolab.
Camera Plus Pro and Photoshop mobile
maybe u can try a chinese fotografic app called 美图看看，one of best fotografic app ever， and it is free， i use it most frequently，even better than camera+
@coye can't find 美图看看 in AppStore
Imstagram. No Just kidding. But it's a nice app.
I was using Instagram for sharing photos but I like the new features of Camera+ a lot.
